Esperanto: uses diacritics (ĉ  ĝ  ĥ  ĵ  ŝ  ŭ) and digraphs{{which?|date=December 2019}}
Example: Translation of "chamber"  "shoe"  and "square": ambro / uo / adrato (Esp.) ambro / uo / adrato (Ido)

Ido: gender-neutral by default; masculine and feminine optional
Example: Gender of "elephant": elefanto (default) / elefantino (fem.) (Esp.) elefanto (default) / elefantulo (masc.) / elefantino (fem.) (Ido)
Translation of "warm" and "cold": varma / varma (Esp.) varma / kolda (Ido)
Translation of "big dogs": granda hundoj (Esp.) granda hundi (Ido)
Translation of "I drink milk" / "I milk drink": "mi trinkas lakto" / "mi lakton trinkas" (Esp.) "me drinkas lakto" / "me lakton drinkas" (Ido)
